snippet: The territory flounders in its debts while Congress fails to allow bankruptcy. It’s time for the Obama administration to get involved.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Michelle Wilde Anderson urges Treasury Dept to intervene immediately to help Puerto Rico restructure its debt as congress has failed to pass legislation to allow it to file bankruptcy; warns of vicious cycle in which island's economy continues to worsen due austerity policies implemented to address enormous debt.
lead_paragraph: The territory flounders in its debts while Congress fails to allow bankruptcy. It’s time for the Obama administration to get involved.

headline.main: Let the U.S. Treasury Rescue Puerto Rico
